body:
What is this man.. 

First off i'm not blaming anyone for hacking :)

But I have a question. How does one hit give me 30 block KB? I was literally hitting the guy and he hits me once, does CRITS in that one hit and knocks me into the void. It was at least a 7 block KB. How the hell does this happen? I'm sure it isn't jitterclicking because I jitterclick and I don't get KB.

Also.. people are doing more than just breezily bridging. There are some that are jitterbridging.. is that bannable or not?

Please?
elaborate.
body_tagged:
What is this man.. 

First off i'm not blaming anyone for hacking :)

But I have a question. How does one hit give me 30 block KB? I was literally hitting the guy and he hits me once, does CRITS in that one hit and knocks me into the void. It was at least a 7 block KB. How the hell does this happen? I'm sure it isn't jitterclicking because I jitterclick and I don't get KB.

Also.. people are doing more than just breezily bridging. There are some that are jitterbridging.. is that bannable or not?

Please?
elaborate.
title: KB and others

replies.body:
Jitterclicking does nothing to kb. Most likely it's due to sprint reset.
No, jitterbridging is allowed.
replies.body_tagged:
Jitterclicking does nothing to kb. Most likely it's due to sprint reset.
No, jitterbridging is allowed.

if you are talking about my KB, am doing a technique called Hybrid blockhitting, that is all I am going to tell you :p

Jitterbridging is allowed aslong as you do it legit ofc, so no autoclicker

replies.body:
To all those saying blockhitting  doesn't give more knockback, yout right but only if youre doing it constantly. If yiu hit blockhit hit blockhit with the right timing it's basically like w tapping since it resets your sprint. 

@OP I blame Avi Kb xd. But really, it's just people with certain ping that get more kb and people that know how to w tap.
replies.body_tagged:
To all those saying blockhitting  doesn't give more knockback, yout right but only if youre doing it constantly. If yiu hit blockhit hit blockhit with the right timing it's basically like w tapping since it resets your sprint. 

@OP I blame Avi Kb xd. But really, it's just people with certain ping that get more kb and people that know how to w tap.

replies.body: ^ Timing your blockhits is the best way to get combos etc
replies.body_tagged: ^ Timing your blockhits is the best way to get combos etc
